summary.en: “Combine” most commonly means to join things together; it can also mean a harvest machine (combine harvester).
summary.zh: “combine”最常见意思是“结合、合并”；也可指“联合收割机”。

definition.en: to join two or more things together to make one unit or to work together
definition.zh: 把两个或更多事物结合成一个整体；合作

examples.en: We combined our money to buy a gift.
examples.zh: 我们把钱凑在一起买了一份礼物。

examples.en: If you combine study with rest, you’ll learn better.
examples.zh: 如果把学习和休息结合起来，你会学得更好。

definition.en: a machine that cuts and collects grain during harvest (short for “combine harvester”)
definition.zh: 联合收割机（“combine harvester”的简称）

examples.en: The combine moved slowly across the field.
examples.zh: 联合收割机缓慢地穿过田地。

extraExplanation: 你输入的“conbinas”在英文中不是常见拼写，最可能是把 combine 拼错了（m/n 键相邻，容易误按）。如果你想表达西语“combinas”（你把……搭配/组合），英文通常用 “(you) combine” 或 “(you) mix/match”。
